General.Name: Companhia Habitasul de Participações
General.Description: Companhia Habitasul de Participações, together with its subsidiaries, develops and sells real estate properties in Brazil. It also manages and leases hotels under the IL Campanario Villaggio Resort and Jurerê Beach Village names. In addition, the company manufactures and sells packaging paper and corrugated cardboard products, as well as kraft papers and resins. The company was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Porto Alegre, Brazil. Companhia Habitasul de Participações is a subsidiary of Companhia Comercial de Imóveis S/A.
General.Address: Rua General João Manoel, 157, Porto Alegre, RS, Brazil, 90010-030
